#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,s,c,l,sgame,cgame;
	char ch;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>l;
		s=c=sgame=cgame=0;
		for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
		{
			cin>>ch;
			if(ch=='S')
				s++;
			else
				c++;
			if(s==4)
			{
				sgame++;
				s=c=0;
			}
			else if(c==4)
			{
				cgame++;
				s=c=0;
			}
		}
		cout<<sgame<<"-"<<cgame;
		if(!(s==0 && c==0))
		{
			cout<<",";
			if(s==0) cout<<0<<"-";
			else if(s==1) cout<<15<<"-";
			else if(s==2) cout<<30<<"-";
			else if(s==3) cout<<40<<"-";
			if(c==0) cout<<0;
			else if(c==1) cout<<15;
			else if(c==2) cout<<30;
			else if(c==3) cout<<40;
		}
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
